com.tomzhu.hash

Class HopscotchHashTable<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomzhu.hash.HopscotchHashTable<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of key
    V - the type of value

    public class HopscotchHashTable<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    a simple hopscotch hash table implementation.

    The hop information is maintained by the hop variable.

    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    tomzhu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HopscotchHashTable()
      construct a default hopscotchHashTable with initialCapacity (16) and hopSize (4)
      HopscotchHashTable(int initialCapacity, int hopSize)
      construct a hopscotchashTable by initialCapacity and hopSize.

        public void insert(K key,

        insert the key-value pair to current map. if a same key exists, the previous value would be replaced
        Parameters:

        value -

      • get

        public V get(K key)
        try to get the associated value for key. return null if no such key exists
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • remove

        public boolean remove(K key)
        remove the key-value pair from current map, return false if not found.
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        true if success and false if such key not found
